descriptors.description: Demonstrates Certificate Based Authentication and Pairing over BLE. This example utilizes TrustZone for storing keys.

descriptors.name: bt_soc_csr_generator_tz_workspace
descriptors.label: bt_soc_csr_generator_tz_workspace
descriptors.description: Certificate generating firmware workspace. Software is generating the device EC key pair, the signing request for the device certificate, and other related data. The generated data can be read out by the Central Authority. This example utilizes TrustZone for storing keys.

descriptors.name: bt_soc_tz_secure_application
descriptors.label: Sample project for TrustZone Secure Key Library
descriptors.description: This project can be used as a reference implementation for creating secure applications with TrustZone for bluetooth products. This project makes a TrustZone secure library for running PSA libraries in the secure world.
